The Intern is an upcoming American comedy film directed by Nancy Meyers. The film stars Robert De Niro and Anne Hathaway, Nat Wolff, Adam DeVine. 70-year-old widower Ben Whittaker has discovered that retirement isn’t all it’s cracked up to be. Seizing an opportunity to get back in the game, he becomes a senior intern at an online fashion site, founded and run by Jules Ostin.
